name: powerSwitch_getStatus
description: This function is used to get the on or off state of a smart home appliance or device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device for which the power status is requested is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device for which the power status is requested.
